scenario_description: The hotel contact provides unexpected new information, stating that the hotel will be under renovation during the requested period and offers alternative dates or a sister property.

thread.subject: Re: New Year Rewards Program
thread.body: Hi team, following up on our New Year Rewards Program campaign. Are you the right contact for this?

thread.subject: Re: Re: New Year Rewards Program
thread.body: Yes, I am.  Thanks for reaching out!

thread.subject: Re: Re: Re: New Year Rewards Program
thread.body: Great! We're looking to partner for the New Year's period, December 28th - January 2nd.

thread.subject: Re: Re: Re: Re: New Year Rewards Program
thread.body: I'm so sorry, but we'll be undergoing renovations during that period.  We expect significant disruption.

thread.subject: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: New Year Rewards Program
thread.body: Oh dear, that's unfortunate.  Could we explore alternative dates? Perhaps the week before or after?

thread.subject: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: New Year Rewards Program
thread.body: Let me check.  Alternatively, our sister property, Hotel Tranquility, is available and has similar amenities. Would you be open to that option?

thread.subject: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: New Year Rewards Program
thread.body: We'll consider both options. Thanks for your prompt response and understanding.
